fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Summon a ryusei, choosing two targets to be hit during the night. If ichi of your targets are evil, you will attack them. If both of your targets are evil, you will instead ijime both (kakkoi!). Otherwise, one of your ni targets are chosen at random. If you kill a town member, you feel really not daijobu in your kokoro. You will become shinde from guilt at the end of the following yoru.
**Sora ni kietai** â€”  Leave your inochi behind, becoming a subarashi hinotori, and then flying off into the sky like hanabi, kakeru away from all threats. During the day, remove yourself permanently from the game. The following night, you will make everyone feel very mera mera, dealing a basic attack to every player. One use, cannot be used until day 4.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Evils are secretly notified of your existence at the start of the game.
- If you attack both evil targets, you will gain temporary saikyou defence for the night.
- You will still win if your faction wins after removing yourself from the game.
- You are a Nihongo Master desu.
